thread.title: Lenovo Design & User Experience Team Wins Platinum in A' Consumer Electronics Design Awards
thread.title_full: Lenovo Design & User Experience Team Wins Platinum in A' Consumer Electronics Design Awards - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Lenovo Design & User Experience Team Wins Platinum in A' Consumer Electronics Design Awards
text:
Yoga 3 Pro by Yingjia Yao wins Platinum A' Design Award in Digital and Electronic Devices Design Competition
Como, Italy (PRWEB) September 19, 2015
A' Design Award and Competition is pleased to inform that the design project Yoga 3 Pro by Lenovo Design & User Experience Team has been announced as a winner of the Platinum A' Design Award in Digital and Electronic Devices Design Competition Category.
Details of Yoga 3 Pro
Lenovo Design & User Experience Team the creative group behind the award winning Consumer Electronics design Yoga 3 Pro explained “The Lenovo Yoga3 pro is a convertible Laptop. It is exceptionally thin and light, yet brilliantly intelligent, with a revolutionary new hinge design and intuitive software that responds to how you use it. Whether for work or play, YOGA is a convertible laptop that adapts to you with 4 basic ways to do almost anything: Laptop, Stand, Tent or Tablet. Besides that, you can find more usage ways based on different scenarios. ” To learn more visit: https://competition.adesignaward.com/design.php?ID=38800
The Platinum A' Design Award
The Platinum A' Design Award is a prestigious award given to top 1% percentile designs that demonstrates an exemplary level of quality in design. Entries to the A' Design Award & Competition are peer reviewed and anonymously judged by an expert jury panel consisting of established scholars, design professionals and editors following predetermined evaluation guidelines. Laureates of the A' Design Award & Competition are given the A' Design Prize which includes a series of PR and marketing services such as inclusion in World Design Rankings and complimentary consultancy from Design Mediators in addition to the award trophy, design excellence certificate, exhibition and gala-night exhibition, in order to celebrate the status of winning the accolades.
About A' Design Award and Competition
A' Design Award and Competitions is the worlds' most international design accolade with participation from two-hundred countries and territories. The A' Design Awards are organized in each and every design, art, architecture and engineering discipline to feature, promote and highlight good designs that create benefits to the society. The ultimate aim of the competition is to create a global awareness for good design practices and principles by featuring great designs. Learn more about the A' Design Competition by visiting: http://www.whatisadesignaward.com
